name: Chicken Cheese Roll Recipe | Tahir Chaudhary | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Chicken Cheese Roll Recipe: Spring roll wraps 12 Butter 4 tsp Cheese 1 cup Green Chilies (Chopped) 2 Mint and coriander (Mixed) 1 tbsp Onion (Small) 1 Tikka chunks (Chopped) Â½ cup Salt A pinch
instructions: In a bowl, combine all the ingredients except the spring roll wraps. Individually cover half of each wrap with the prepared mixture. Make a tight roll by applying a little flour paste along the edge. Bake in a preheated oven for about 20 minutes or deep fry. Serve the delicious chicken cheese rolls before the family and guests.
